name: Mahesh Medam
about:
Mahesh Medam is an Indian Software Developer looking for the next billion-user project!! He develops software that is convenient to use while preserving aesthetics. An ever-consuming passion for building solutions and exploring new things drives him.

He has been working as a full-time software developer since 2020. Even as a student, he took up roles as an intern/freelancer garnering experience in UI/UX, Backend, Machine learning, and Data. He showed the potential to develop novel solutions by performing in various hackathons. In his free time, you can find him playing games, watching anime, and working on passion projects.

Check out his work below and if you feel you can have a great time building stuff together, contact him hereðŸ‘‡

journey.name: Ola Electric Mobility Pvt. Ltd.
journey.description: Payment and Refund System, Hazelcast Cache Locking, Spring Boot, Apache Kafka, PayU Payment Gateway Integration, Ola Money Wallet Integration, CRON, Webhooks

journey.name: Avenoir
journey.description: NodeJs, Express, MySQL, React, JWT with Refresh Token, Role-based Authorization, KYC Verification, SMS Verfication, Referral Feature, CoinPayments Payment Gateway, Admin Dashboard Development

journey.name: Scaler Academy
journey.description: Algorithms and Data Structures, System Design, Operating Systems, ReactJS

journey.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
journey.description: Dual Degree, Department of Aerospace Engineering

journey.name: Instoried Research Labs Pvt. Ltd.
journey.description: DeepLearning, RNN, ULMFiT, Sentiment Analysis, Emotion Classification, Language Modeling, Worked on improving Word Recommendation, PyTorch

journey.name: Accenture Innovation Challege 2018 [Finalist]
journey.description:
Developed a chrome extension that analyzes upto 20 pages of customer reviews of smartphones on Flipkart and Amazon websites.
REST API, JSON Web Token Authentication, Puppeteer, NodeJs, Naive Bayes, Factor-wise Sentiment Analysis

journey.name: Pyramid SoftSol Pvt. Ltd.
journey.description:
Worked with team on design, development and integration of real-time video analytic solution for tracking patient's medicine usage.
Developed a Healthcare AI virtual assistant which can book appointments, take blood pressure and diabetic readings leveraging RASA.ai.
Computer Vision, Transfer Learning, Object Detection, Rasa.ai, Chatbot System, Django, Tensorflow

journey.name: ChemicalShoppe Pvt. Ltd.
journey.description: Worked on CRM Platform, Ecommerce Website and implemented custom scrapers for cataloguing purposes.

journey.name: Code.fun.do SHOWCASE 2017, Microsoft [Finalist]
journey.description: Developed a Messenger chatbot to help commuters get information regarding trains like live status, confirmation status and route. Consumed LUIS.ai api for Named Entity Recognition and Intent Classification and scraped railwayapi.com for railway information. Designed and created the chatbot utilizing Bootstrap and AJAX for UI and PHP for backend to consume the response of LUIS.ai API.

testimonials.description: I had the good fortune of mentoring Mahesh during his internship at Instoried. The thing I liked most about him was the minimal supervision he needed to accomplish his tasks. That, accompanied by his ability to read, comprehend, and quickly implement research papers proved to be very beneficial during our initial R&D stage for understanding Deep Learning based NLP / NLU algorithms. Finally, he has the initial sparks of an entrepreneurial spirit which proves to be very useful, as I found him to be invested in the business / strategy aspect of our company as well. Wishing him unlimited luck for whatever endeavour he chooses to pursue.
Mahesh demonstrated excellent ML/AI capabilities in building chatbot framework and SSD models in minimal time. He will be a recommended for any ML projects and Job opportunities.
Mahesh demonstrated excellent skills in Node.Js and React.Js while building a web based dashboard within minimal time. He is recommended for any full stack development projects and Job opportunities.
